content: **crocheted hedgehog/christmas decoration in drops lima piece is worked in the round from the snout and towards the back with pouf stitches theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsholidayhedges drops design pattern li-193 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx circumference 17 cm length 10 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour for head 0100 off white / 0206 wheat 50 g colour for body 0619 beige / 9024 almond / 9026 chestnut / 5610 deep taupe and use some left- colour black - for snout and eyes **accessories** some cotton wool for filling 1 hedgehog weighs approx 16 g without filling **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm **crochet gauge** 20 double crochets in width and 20 row vertically on hook size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
